name: HoverRocket
description:
This game is still in development. Many features aren't balanced yet and many things will be added over time. If you got some feedback for me just leave a comment or use the ingame feedback option :)

A small Platformer in space.

Collect Fuel to keep you airborne, collect coins to buy upgrades.

Controls:

A/Left Arrow Key/Left Mouse Button  - Activate Left Engine

D/Right Arrwo Key/ Right Mouse Button - Activate Right Engine

Activate both to fly up.
